    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActiveItem()
      Creates an ActiveItem with a horizontal orientation and a blank border.
      ActiveItem(Script script)
      Creates an ActiveItem with a horizontal orientation and a blank border that is connected to the given Script object.
      ActiveItem(Variables<V> variable, boolean showTitle)
      Creates an ActiveItem with a horizontal orientation and a blank border that is associated with the given Variables object.
      ActiveItem(Variables<V> variable, boolean showTitle, Script script)
      Creates an ActiveItem with a horizontal orientation and a blank border that is associated with the given Variables object and runs the given Script.
